events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund due to their request for money back on the incorrect item shipment.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong product received.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about your order mix-up. I’m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can process the refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I have attached a photo showing that I received the wrong jacket instead of the shoes I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate a full refund immediately and send you a prepaid return label to send back the incorrect item.
I appreciate the quick response and refund promise. Looking forward to receiving the return label soon.
The refund has been processed and the return shipping label emailed to the customer, resolving their case.
Checking in to confirm you received the refund and if you need any further assistance with your order.
Since the refund was received and no further issues reported, the case has been formally closed.
